DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the use, usability and feasibility of an Application (App) for patients with rheumatoid arthritis with diary functionalities, in patient-physician interaction.
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Medically Supervised Patient Management in Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: age >= 18 years, owner of App capable device, RA, informed consent non German speaking, no App capable device available
